Location may use sources like GPS, Wi‑Fi, mobile networks, and sensors to help estimate your device’s location. Google may collect location data periodically and use this data in an anonymous way to improve location accuracy and location-based services.

@Module.Name: Evaluate
@Module.Description: This module is an evaluation module, evaluating the selected components of their contribution to fulfilling the user's intent

@History_operation: -> Scroll forward on android.widget.ScrollView -> Click on clickable 'android:id/title' Location 'android:id/summary' On - 1 app has access to location -> Click on clickable 'android:id/title' Advanced 'android:id/summary' Emergency Location Service, Google Location Accuracy, Google Location History, Google Location Sharing -> Scroll forward on androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView -> Scroll forward on androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
